flawed_nl_solution:
Jake weighs 8kg more than 52 kg which is 8+52 = <<8+52=60>>60 kg
Tracy and Jake together weigh 60+52 = <<60+52=117>>117kg
John therefore weighs 158-117 = <<158-117=41>>41 kg
The range of their weights is 60-41 = <<60-41=19>>19kg
#### 19

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 112, not 117. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
